files.content:
# Test Repository

This is a test repository for crowd.dev git integration testing.

commits.message:
Add configuration file

This commit adds the main configuration file for the project.

Signed-off-by: Bob Reviewer <bob@example.com>

Fix critical security vulnerability

This patch addresses a security issue in the authentication module.

Signed-off-by: Charlie Developer <charlie@example.com>
Reviewed-by: Alice Developer <alice@example.com>
Tested-by: David Tester <david@example.com>

Implement new feature together

This feature was developed in pair programming session.

Co-authored-by: Eve Pair <eve@example.com>
Signed-off-by: Frank Lead <frank@example.com>

Refactor authentication module

Removed old code and added new implementation.

Reviewed-by: Alice Developer <alice@example.com>

Update documentation

Updated the README with new instructions.

Reviewed-By: No Email Here
Signed-off-by: Henry Docs <henry@example.com>

files.content:
# Test Repository

This is a test repository for crowd.dev git integration testing.

## Getting Started
Run tests with: make test

commits.message:
Fix typo in config

Signed-off-by: Ivan <ivan@example.com>>
Reviewed-by: Jane <<jane@example.com>

Merge pull request from external contributor

This commit was authored by a contributor but committed by a maintainer.

Signed-off-by: Linda Contributor <linda@external.com>
